name: The Beast and the Town
description:
This is my submission for the text based game jam 2022 (https://itch.io/jam/textbased-jam).

Contains only text (ASCII-characters), with input read only from the keyboard. Made in Python as open-source with only Python built-in libraries. 

To run the game,  either download the executable and run it on your computer or get the code from https://github.com/zac112/textbasedjam2022/releases/tag/jam_release and run it with Python (made with 3.8.6, but any 3.x should work). Executable is Windows-only, python code from repository can be run on all machines.
